pageContent: Prostate cancer developed in two male patients being treated with fluoxymesterone for erectile impotence. It is suggested that the current increased interest in and therapy for sexual dysfunction be accompanied by an awareness of a possible causal relationship between exogenous androgens and prostrate cancer.

metaData.source:
Preservation of sexual function in men during radical pelvic surgery
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/2333025/
